Body:
I am working on an IoT project. The device will request its state through a webservice/socket. I need to change a device's record if I got no request to get device's data within time slot.

How can I do that?

Welcome to Stack Overflow! I edited the title of your question because you don't need to specify technologies in there; that is what tags are for. I also deleted the closing, as that distracts from the question. There where also some issues with the grammar of the body and title, so I fixed those.  The question you have is not vary specific, so go and try for what you want, and come back with any issues you encounter when implementing it. Happy coding!
